source: ##### Load CSV files into temporary views

# Path to your ADLS folder
atc_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/denmark_medicine_atc/"
product_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/denmark_medicine_product/"

# Read all CSVs from both datasets recursively into separate dataframes
df_atc = (
    spark.read
    .option("header", "false")
    .option("delimiter", ";")
    .csv(atc_path, recursiveFileLookup=True)
)

df_product = (
    spark.read
    .option("header", "false")
    .option("delimiter", ";")
    .csv(product_path, recursiveFileLookup=True)
)

# Drop empty columns
df_atc = df_atc.drop("_c13")
df_product = df_product.drop("_c14")

# Add headers
new_cols_atc = [
    "atc", 
    "year", 
    "sector", 
    "region", 
    "sex", 
    "age_group", 
    "users", 
    "users_per_thousand_inhabitants", 
    "turnover_thousand_dkk", 
    "regional_subsidy_thousand_dkk", 
    "thousand_units_sold", 
    "units_sold_per_thousand_inhabitants_per_day", 
    "share_of_sales_linked_to_person"
    ]

new_cols_product = [
    "atc",
    "year",
    "sector",
    "item_number",
    "a1_units_sold_thousand",
    "a1_quantity_thousand",
    "a1_turnover_thousand_dkk",
    "a2_units_sold_thousand",
    "a2_units_sold_subsidy_thousand",
    "a2_quantity_thousand",
    "a2_turnover_thousand_dkk",
    "a2_regional_subsidy_thousand_dkk",
    "a3_units_sold_thousand",
    "a3_quantity_thousand"
]

df_atc_renamed = df_atc.toDF(*new_cols_atc)
df_product_renamed = df_product.toDF(*new_cols_product)

# Create temp views
df_atc_renamed.createOrReplaceTempView("raw_data_atc")
df_product_renamed.createOrReplaceTempView("raw_data_product")

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW product_minimal AS
SELECT 
    atc,
    year,
    sum(a3_units_sold_thousand) as a3_units_sold_thousand
FROM raw_data_product 
WHERE sector = 300
  AND atc IN (
    'A10AB01','A10AB03','A10AB04','A10AB05','A10AB06',
    'A10AC01','A10AC03','A10AC30','A10AD01','A10AD03',
    'A10AD04','A10AD05','A10AE01','A10AE02','A10AE04',
    'A10AE05','A10AE06','A10AE54','A10AE56','A10BA02',
    'A10BB01','A10BB02','A10BB07','A10BB12','A10BD03',
    'A10BD04','A10BD05','A10BD07','A10BD08','A10BD10',
    'A10BD11','A10BD15','A10BD19','A10BD20','A10BD21',
    'A10BD23','A10BD24','A10BF01','A10BG01','A10BG02',
    'A10BG03','A10BH01','A10BH02','A10BH03','A10BH05',
    'A10BJ01','A10BJ02','A10BJ03','A10BJ05','A10BJ06',
    'A10BK01','A10BK02','A10BK03','A10BK04','A10BX02','A10BX03'
  )
GROUP BY atc, year;

SELECT * FROM product_minimal;

%%sql

-- Aggregate granular 5th-level ATCs up to 4th level (A10AB, A10BK, etc.)
WITH product_granular_agg AS (
    SELECT 
        SUBSTRING(atc, 1, 5) AS atc4,  -- roll up to 4th-level ATC
        year,
        SUM(a3_units_sold_thousand) AS total_units_granular
    FROM raw_data_product
    WHERE sector = 300
    GROUP BY SUBSTRING(atc, 1, 5), year
)

SELECT 
    a.atc AS atc4,
    a.year,
    a.thousand_units_sold AS total_units_reported,
    g.total_units_granular,
    (g.total_units_granular - a.thousand_units_sold) AS difference,
    ROUND(
        100.0 * g.total_units_granular / NULLIF(a.thousand_units_sold,0),
        2
    ) AS pct_coverage
FROM raw_data_atc a
LEFT JOIN product_granular_agg g
       ON a.atc = g.atc4 AND a.year = g.year
WHERE a.sector = 300
ORDER BY a.year, a.atc;

%%sql
SELECT DISTINCT atc
FROM raw_data_atc
WHERE sector = 300
ORDER BY atc
